story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_0100_10:
In a serious battle against you, a Trainer who
desires victory with every fiber of your being...
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_0200_10: We’ll both get to know our Pokémon even better!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_0400_10: That’s why I requested this challenge.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_0500_10: I will win...and prove my love for my friends!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’m Iris, the Champion, and I’m going to
defeat you!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_1300_10: The pain of my Pokémon... I feel it, too!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_1600_10:
So I’m gonna let my friend I met at the
Midnight Parade join the fray...
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_1700_10: ’Cause I want you to meet them too!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Down to my final friend... Please, lend me your
courage!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I’ll hone my mind and become one with
my Pokémon!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_2400_10: (If we lose now, proving our bond will—)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Separating people from Pokémon...
Do anything but that!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_2800_10:
You and I both put our beliefs on the line and
fought with all our strength.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3100_10:
(Back then, I tried to validate my beliefs by
showing my strength.)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3200_10: (Looking back, that battle was incredibly sad.)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3300_10:
(Just like back then, I’m still fighting desperately,
giving this battle everything I have. And I still
can’t afford to lose.)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3500_10:
(It’s different now. My heart is singing! I’m having
so much fun!)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3600_10:
That’s right... Despite similar circumstances,
this is different.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3700_10:
I’m not burdened by duty or destiny. I’m just here
to battle as a Pokémon Trainer.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3800_10:
I won’t take away anything that’s important to
others...nor will I let others take from me.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_3900_10: And even if I lose here and now...
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4000_10:
Until I make my dreams come true, we’ll rise
again and again, no matter how many times it
takes!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Thank you, Zoroark. You’ve reminded me of
something important.
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4200_10:
(I’ve made it this far because of the people and
Pokémon who’ve lent me their strength.)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4300_10: (And that’s why I still can’t choose a number one.)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4400_10: (But in this moment, what I feel most is...)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4500_10:
(the need to win, no matter what ideals or truths
we pursue!)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4600_10: (And I want to do it with Zoroark by my side!)
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_4800_10:
The strength of your bond with Zoroark’s been
acknowledged!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_5100_10:
No! Not yet!
No! We can fight on!!
story_arceus_03_10000/2401_1001_5200_10:
I want to show everyone our formula for changing
our world!
